7fb4f28a-84a7-4594-8f14-a0cb7cbf4a25: A shot with a specially crafted needle, which inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
7691ca4c-afdb-4e7b-9330-5d5e0d6ed589:
A special attack that counts as a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}.
It deals an additional <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but may trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
664405ce-c7df-468f-92c2-adc2f20243bc: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
1842ccf1-7e8a-4b81-8074-7cdec4f9604b: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.
0ebb35d1-eee7-4976-92c9-ef65177d19c1: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.
ac1f8192-bd8e-416d-bd52-6a1352020ae2: Applies +1 stack of the shadow quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.
e1fc9e9b-1f0d-4ed2-8cd9-460cae126b67: Applies +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
38ec3969-a5b1-4daf-8f54-7b614fdf41f3: Attack with a power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
e328a649-41b4-486e-b3da-c476be057d7f: Creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within and inflicting the burning {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
a14c67af-2205-4c0d-914c-91ea1b2a890b: Creatures under the frenzy effect gain an additional attack, yet suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
6000ec1a-0ff6-492d-b96f-97b97bd1421e: Deals <u>(from 4 to 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
44b0edaf-a6e7-452b-b199-7a2cf0d24e84: Deals <u>(from 5 to 11)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and applies +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} of disease effect.
3d095e6e-f4a5-44c2-a3af-ecffa5d2a3ea: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if the poisoned creatures fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
d596d9c2-5eb4-4216-bed9-efb0f39e1d0d: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, decreasing the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −10% for each stack.
8b08fa30-7d37-42bb-b56c-ea347e3881fd: Decreases the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chances{/g} of allies and enemies with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons by −50%.
705c0173-1d97-4fa4-a67e-00819c3311ea: Decreases {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} by −3, but increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +12.
3ad07268-e30c-4d6e-a549-b2b3d7dffd2e: Fully restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} but decreases the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
1219e495-d91e-41ce-b162-4103e237d7eb: Heals themselves and increases {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.
a04480e3-cc2d-4577-83e5-91a58348b6d9: If a diseased creature gains 3 stacks of the shadow quarters disease effect, the abscesses on their body will erupt with caustic pus, dealing 13 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and resetting the stacks to 1.
573a2508-f6bf-4451-bfde-52e264d13c5c: If this creature dies, it explodes, damaging all targets nearby.
337ac727-c245-4d28-af24-9f34fd439838: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} of adjacent allies.
581f7917-fcb5-4380-986e-390cb6edabb6: Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Aeldari ranger's attacks.
69f07229-4bcd-4f89-be46-8eacd6bd1a1d: Increases {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} by +3, but decreases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −3.
a9698b0d-8b39-4187-9103-c0c21452e90e: Inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
f08d4594-919c-400d-bfe8-4e376f1ed5b0: Minimum {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} decreased by −10, maximum damage increased by +18.
239e2a06-2006-4a22-a6c1-41cc111883c3: Pushes an enemy up to 2 cells away.
5625409c-ad93-4847-bbac-bd888d865e6b: Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by −2 for their next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until their next turn.
f7282c02-ae52-450c-a8cb-c4e2d2b5840f: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
dcd34d5f-19aa-4459-b7b6-b7b8ba12197b: Swing strike that affects two enemies in front of the attacker.
edb89e13-5eee-45b1-88f8-0fdf82e1357d: The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.
24a04c4e-b2c2-403c-90ce-e09b9e0f9713: The creature is infected and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. In 2 turns their body will {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, releasing a toxic cloud.
60c8ccf6-2e3f-46c5-b6a3-90c3b96bc825: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
75c73af4-48d3-4660-9700-73d74c728184: The first enemy that attacks this creature in the current {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} will be cursed for 2 rounds.
117af3ef-6cd9-47b9-b749-34eca6d404e1: The future was foreseen for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}: this creature's next attack must succeed, and the next attack against it must miss. The creature's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} increases by +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%.
4f77af4f-92e2-4690-a268-222ca53002d8: The plasma battery explodes, dealing <u>(from 8 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} and inflicting the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on everyone in a 2-cell radius. This explosion has 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
7d04d5a8-48f5-4b99-8dd8-09179fb527ee: The servo-skull activates its self-destruction protocol, damaging everyone around it.
2689a26c-3e90-42d3-8f9e-e96e164f411c: The target restores <u>(from 8 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gets rid of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
b463ed1d-fb6b-422b-8e83-51e2c330be20: The world around feels less vivid. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are reduced by −10.
b63ee6a9-2a8e-46d9-a7f0-e535e02102eb:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
- the allies' next attack always succeeds
- the next attack against these allies misses
- the allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased
bd527962-476e-4ead-8b76-0d325957d57f: This attack pushes the enemy away for <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> cells.
8314d684-08ab-448c-b528-9a65181471af: This creature almost lost their mind, but also gained an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
d2d2dd23-f98f-450e-84a4-d8a86a686e8d: This creature can perform an additional {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.
82360f73-4d08-422d-8368-b33ea2d7ea3f: This creature gains +5 minimum {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +6 maximum damage.
25bd1050-3f84-48d7-b847-7c99e98aaaa0: This creature gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
a6c188de-00a5-4bae-80ac-2fe0d944d360: This creature has already received orders from their commander and cannot accept new ones.
6f49a6a7-9c6d-4d6b-a52e-a882fe7547d4: This creature is ready to curse the enemy that attacks them first this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
b1127856-363d-4cb2-99f0-a71f86cbdfc3: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.
4a4122b6-afa3-47b6-ba9e-c32d1836c3b4: This creature suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
ade91f1f-c824-4e69-a87e-9b4faa823fce:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}explosive damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
cffa0489-1bfe-4d26-b244-8a59739d3ae7: This creature will fulfil any of its commander's orders.
cd25cedf-b660-4f77-a749-7dc1d9aa81cd: This creature will rise after their death to serve as a mindless puppet.
d3c1e831-e752-4481-9e78-1529b0c9ac62: This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} are increased.
ee186946-fbeb-4eb6-b41b-5f505e379c0e:
This toxic substance ruthlessly corrodes any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} it touches.
<indent=5%>−10% armour</indent>
<indent=5%>−2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>

a517707f-a3e5-4153-9c7e-19df47e57815: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.
a2091d26-92f8-419c-944c-22b474ac3894: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.
d5cf5921-0b7a-4c2c-b4bc-5c8d85d1ce70: While this creature has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it gains +40% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, −6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and may only attack once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
d57333ed-5533-414e-8d37-c49d27a65a28: Wide slashing strike which affects multiple enemies at once and poisons {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets with {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

34ba1195-0f93-48b7-845d-8715d415b0c7: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are reduced by −10 for the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
